text: Badarwas is a town and a nagar panchayat in Shivpuri district in the state of Madhya Pradesh, India. ==Geography== Badarwas is located at .Falling Rain Genomics, Inc - Badarwas It has an average elevation of 471 metres (1,545 feet). ==Demographics== India census, Badarwas had a population of 10,408. Males constitute 52% of the population and females 48%. Badarwas has an average literacy rate of 62%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with 61% of the males and 39% of females literate. 17% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Shivpuri
title: Badarwas
